sequence:
Light Carrier Ryuujou, Moving Out!

<size=45>Chapter 3: Focus! Don't stop until you've reached your goal!</size>

scripts.say: At the workshop, two people are inspecting the materials brought back from commissions.
I've just cross-checked with the commission report. The coin and skill book counts are all consistent, and so is the fuel expenditure.
... Want to know something else? Commander used to be an insomniac. Junyou always stayed by their side at night, so she knows~
Along with the supplies, we've also received a mental unit from Headquarters... The prior year, Commander also took Junyou on a "personal vacation~"
Good for you. Look over this as well.
The number of aviation parts is correct... Ahh... that's right, Commander also promised to marry me after the war ended... I wonder when that'll be...
Mhm. Two more things to look over... I think this commission was a Great Success!
Ahh, I'm so happy! I'll be the first to let Commander know, since I'm the childhood friend and all!
Appreciate it. Wait... isn't that your job in the first place as secretary?
At last, the two of them finished their work.
Hey, Ryuujou? I have a date coming up with Commander~ Where do you think we should go?
I don't recall seeing any plans like that in Milord's schedule. All right, that wraps up today's work.
Junyou, I'll be frank. We're very busy, so we can't have you dragging Commander off to a date.
Tsk... Well, I'll excuse myself then. I suppose you should report to Commander yourself then~
... I wonder what that would feel like...
